definitions: relating to or denoting the process by which different kinds of living organisms are believed to have developed from earlier forms

examples.text: chance enters into the evolutionary process in the form of naturally occurring random mutations

shortDefinitions: relating to or denoting process by which different kinds of organism are believed to have developed

definitions: relating to the gradual development of something

examples.text: updating technology is an evolutionary process

shortDefinitions: relating to gradual development of something

definitions: relating to a pattern of movements or maneuvers

examples.text: he was in command of the evolutionary squadron

shortDefinitions: relating to pattern of movements or manoeuvres
